attributes.action: Ban doorstep salesmen and cold callers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The practice of doorstep salesmen knocking on private homes to sell goods and services, or telephone canvassing, is extremely annoying and dangerous especially to vulnerable people and an unwanted invasion of personal privacy, It should be made illegal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
